name: Sollars & Associates Integrative Counseling and Psychological Services
address: Multiple locations across Michigan, including 1400 W. Maple Rd., Suite 200, Troy, MI 48084
description: This practice offers a wide range of counseling and psychotherapy services with therapists experienced in working with children, adolescents, and families. They have multiple locations across Michigan and explicitly mention offering services in Mandarin

name: Lansing Counseling
address: 5030 Northwind Dr Suite 101, East Lansing, MI 48823
description: Li Mao, an LPC at Lansing Counseling, is a counselor who also has training and experience as a medical doctor in China. She serves diverse populations and offers services in English and Mandarin/Chinese

name: Psychology Today - Mandarin Therapists in Michigan
description: Psychology Today's directory lists numerous therapists and psychologists in Michigan who speak Mandarin. This is a good resource to find individual practitioners

name: Mental Health Match - Mandarin Chinese-speaking Therapists in Detroit, MI
address: Online and various locations in Detroit, MI
description: This platform helps connect individuals with Mandarin Chinese-speaking therapists in Detroit, MI. It emphasizes the importance of communication and finding a therapist who speaks your native language

name: Asians For Mental Health Directory
description: This directory lists Asian therapists, including those who are Chinese-American, in Michigan. It's a valuable resource for finding culturally competent mental health professionals

name: Hsiao-Wen Lo, Ph.D.
description: Dr. Hsiao-Wen Lo is a Taiwanese psychologist based in Ann Arbor, MI, who is listed in the Asians For Mental Health Directory

name: Jennifer Tang, PhD
description: Dr. Jennifer Tang is a Chinese American psychologist in Ann Arbor, MI, listed in the Asians For Mental Health Directory

name: Juliann Li Verdugo
description: Juliann Li Verdugo is a Chinese American therapist in Ann Arbor, MI, listed in the Asians For Mental Health Directory

name: Faith Lyons, MA, LPC, ATR
description: Faith Lyons is a therapist in Grand Rapids, MI, listed in the Asians For Mental Health Directory. While her ethnicity is listed as Multiracial, Korean-Caucasian, she is included in a directory for Asian therapists

name: Amy Nasamran, Ph.D.
description: Dr. Amy Nasamran is a Thai therapist in Lansing, MI, listed in the Asians For Mental Health Directory
